NPC.name: Cosmic horror
NPC.description: A terrible otherworldly horror, its form amorpheous and having no earthly analogue outside of the deepest and most inhospitable ocean depths. Innumerable tentacles continously writhing, swelling, diminishing and grasping. Its body if it even has one is hidden behind the constantly shifting mass of tentacles, the tentacles of unfathomable matter reach out ever further with terrible purpose, truly this entity has no place here amidst light and warmth but yet it comes...violating the sanctity of the world you understand.
